      • add

        public void add(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> text,
       java.lang.String id)
        Add a new document with the given weights to the index. If a document with the given id already exists, it triggers an error.
        Parameters:
        text -
        id -

      • remove

        public void remove(int id)
        Remove an existing index from the index. If no document exists with the given id, it triggers an error.
        Parameters:
        id -

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if the index is empty.

      • getDocuments

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getDocuments(java.lang.String token)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
